text:
As vaccine distribution begins in the U.S., Army Gen. Mark A. Milley, chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, and Senior Enlisted Advisor to the Chairman (SEAC) Ramon "CZ" Colon-Lopez received their first shots of the COVID-19 vaccine.
#COVID19 #Vaccine #LeadfromtheFront https://t.co/IOPr5Q0Weo
